alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 02 at 3:44AM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Near-Blizzard to Blizzard conditions possible. Snowfall accumulations around or greater than 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, North Itasca, Central St. Louis and South Itasca Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion, Deer Creek and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca
